clinical_study.brief_title: Survey of Postoperative Pain and Pain Management in Norwegian Hospitals
clinical_study.official_title: Survey of Postoperative Pain and Pain Management in Norwegian Hospitals

lead_sponsor.agency: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: The study is a national survey of pain and pain management to surgical patients in Norwegian Hospitals. Data on pain management are gathered from patient records and data on pain and patient satisfaction are gathered as patients' self report.

primary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients who report average pain intensity >3 on 11 point pain Numerical Rating scale for the first 24 hours after surgery

arm_group.description: PAtients who had surgery the previous day and are still hospitalized

study_pop.textblock: All patients who had surgery the previous day and still are hospitalized. Patients must give informed consent to participate.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Surgery previous day
Exclusion Criteria:
- Declined participation
- Unable to communicate (delirious, sedated, intubated)
- Does not read and speak Norwegian
- Patient not available (for instance having physiotherapy og examinations during data collection)
